pages.text: A sigil that accelerates time for block entities. Furnaces smelt faster, crops grow quicker, and machines process at incredible speeds.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() Sneak + Right-click on a block entity$(br)$(bold)Duration:$() 30 seconds per activation$(br2)Each activation increases the speed level. Repeatedly clicking the same block stacks the acceleration up to 32x speed.

pages.title: Progression
pages.text: $(bold)Level 1:$() 2x speed - 1,000 LP$(br)$(bold)Level 2:$() 4x speed - 2,000 LP$(br)$(bold)Level 3:$() 8x speed - 4,000 LP$(br)$(bold)Level 4:$() 16x speed - 8,000 LP$(br)$(bold)Level 5:$() 32x speed - 16,000 LP$(br2)$(bold)Refresh:$() 15,000 LP to reset timer at max level

pages.title: Compatibility
pages.text: $(bold)Blacklist:$() Blocks tagged with $(thing)animus:disallow_acceleration$() cannot be accelerated.$(br2)$(bold)Mod Compat:$() Will not stack with GAG's Temporal Pouch, Time in a Bottle, or JustDireThings' Time Wand.$(br2)$(italic)Time bends to the will of blood.$()
